inclusion.criterion: Patients with severe AS defined by an AVA <1cm2 or AVA indexed to BSA of <0.6 cm2/m2,
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: including low-flow severe aortic stenosis defined by SVI <35ml/m2.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Life expectancy <1 year irrespective of severe AS.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe dementia defined as MMS-Test <16 points.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis, but life expectancy is not specified.
